Nematoda.Definition: A class of unsegmented helminths with fundamental bilateral symmetry and secondary triradiate symmetry of the oral and esophageal structures. Many species are parasites. (MSH) * Nematodes are soil-inhabiting roundworms of the Phylum Nematoda. (NCI) * class of unsegmented helminths with fundamental bilateral symmetry and secondary triradiate symmetry of the oral and esophageal structures; many species are parasites. (CSP)Definition Source: UMLS
